name: Delta Squared 2
description:
Change the destiny of everyone!

Prof. Shob Von Darka is invading the Delta Planet with its Shadow Army! Protect the planet at all costs and save its citizens!

Features:

     - 5+ Levels, with unique bosses, plus Credits!   

     - 3 new abilities to use: Bubble, Air and Nature! And the recurring one: Fire!
   
     - All new MARATHON MODE! Blast through endless waves of enemies! If you don't get hit it gets faster!

     - 2 Basic Game Modes: ARCADE and INSANE, play with infinite continues or try the Insane experience!    

     - Dash through low HP enemies to get extra points while defeating them or just to avoid bullets!

     - Collect enemy pixel art with the Capsule drops!

     - Local Coop Multiplayer Mode!     

     - 2 Shoot Modes: PRESS or HOLD!      

Controls*: ActionKeyboardXbox ControllerShootSpace / X / C
A / B
MoveArrows / WASD
Left Analog / D-PadAcceptCABackXBStartPStartDashLeft CtrlRight Trigger

Player 2 controls with numpad or with a second controller. *If Controller(s) not working properly, try selecting "RECONNECT CONTROLLERS" through the Options Menu from the in-game Pause Menu or maybe adding the game to Steam as Non-Steam Game, there you can remap the inputs if you want to.
